title: Dragonflies that fly across oceans
description: While living and working as a marine biologist in Maldives, Charles Anderson noticed sudden explosions of dragonflies at certain times of year. He explains how he carefully tracked the path of a plain, little dragonfly called the globe skimmer, only to discover that it had the longest migratory journey of any insect in the world.
author: Charles Anderson
keywords: TED, talks, biodiversity, biology, birds, insects, science, ecology, india
